short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick and simple note-taking Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Quick Note Taker" is your go-to Chrome extension for jotting down ideas and reminders on the fly. Whether something urgent comes up and you need to quickly jot down information, or you want to copy-paste valuable content and add a brief note beside it for later reference, this tool is designed for speed and convenience. With its user-friendly interface, this extension offers:

 - Two Separate Note Files: Easily switch between two different note files to keep your thoughts organized.

 - Dark Mode: Adjust to your visual preferences with a single click using the "Toggle Dark Mode" button. Whether you're working late or just prefer the aesthetics, Quick Note Taker has got you covered.

 - Sleek Design: A minimalist, resizable popup design ensures that your notes are always accessible without cluttering your workspace.

 - Auto-Placement: Your cursor automatically positions itself at the end of your notes, so you can continue right where you left off.

 - Auto Save Function: Never worry about losing your notes again. With the auto save function, your notes are saved instantly and securely, ready for when you need them.

 - For optimal performance, it's recommended to set up a shortcut to quickly open the extension. Using shortcuts like Ctrl + X or Ctrl + Y will make the process of copy-pasting and note-taking even faster and more efficient.

Equip your Chrome browser with this powerful note-taking companion and ensure you never miss out on capturing important information again!
